title: Gundam RX-78-2
notes: Features markings pre-printed on shoulder armor parts. Includes transformable FF-X7 Core Fighter and Amuro Ray figurine. First Master Grade kit, also the first Gundam kit to be given the correct designation "RX-78-2".

title: MS-06S Zaku II
notes: Includes Char Aznable figurine. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-5. First MG kit with leg inner frame parts.

title: MS-06F/J Zaku II
notes: Color variant of MG-002. Includes Missile Pods, MMP-80 Machine Gun, Cracker Grenades, and Zeon pilot figurine. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-5.

title: Gundam RX-78-3
notes: Color variant of MG-001. First MG kit from the MSV series.

title: MSZ-006 Zeta Gundam
notes: Features stabilizer with pre-printed markings and LED light-up gimmick (requires CR1220 battery). Includes Hyper Mega Launcher, Grenade Launcher, and Kamille Bidan figurine. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-1. First transformable MG.

title: MS-06R-1 Zaku II (Shin Matsunaga Custom)
notes: Parts and color variant of MG-002. Includes Shin Matsunaga figurine.

title: MS-06R-2 Zaku II (J. Ridden Custom)
notes: Parts and color variant of MG-006. Includes Johnny Ridden figurine.

title: MS-14S Gelgoog (C. Aznable Custom)
notes: Includes Char Aznable figurine.

title: MS-14B/C Gelgoog Cannon (J. Ridden Custom)
notes: Parts and color variant of MG-008. Includes Johnny Ridden figurine and parts to create MS-14B Gelgoog High Mobility Type.

title: Gundam GP01
notes: Includes transformable FF-XII Core Fighter II and Kou Uraki figurine. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-24. First Gundam kit with leg inner frame parts.

title: MS-14A Gelgoog
notes: Parts and color variant of MG-008. Uses modified A plate runner of MG-009. Beam Rifle replaced by Beam Machine Gun. Includes Zeon pilot figurine.

title: Gundam GP01Fb
notes: Parts variant of MG-010. Includes transformable FF-XII-Fb Core Fighter II Full Burnern. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-24.

title: Gundam Rx-78 GP02A
notes: Includes Anavel Gato figurine and two Mk-82 nuclear warheads. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-24. First Gundam GP02A kit to have functional shoulder binders.

title: RX-178 Gundam Mk-II (A.E.U.G.)
notes: Includes Kamille Bidan figurine. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-6.

title: RX-178 Gundam Mk-II (Titans)
notes: Color variant of MG-014. Includes Titans pilot figurine. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-7.

title: FXA-05D/RX-178 Super Gundam
notes: Re-release of MG-014 with fully transformable FXA-05D G-Defenser, which is also compatible with MG-082. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-7.

title: RGM-79 GM
notes: Parts and color variant of MG-001. Includes detachable cockpit block and Earth Federation pilot figurine. First MG kit to replace "U.N.T. Spacy" with "E.F.S.F." as the official Earth Federation Forces moniker.

title: MS-05B Zaku I
notes: Parts and color variant of MG-002. First MG kit to replace "Zeon Dukedom" with the official moniker Principality of Zeon.

title: MS-05B Zaku I (Black Tri-Stars)
notes: Color variant of MG-018. Includes 1/20 and 1/100 scale Gaia figures.

title: MS-06R-1A Zaku II (Black Tri-Stars)
notes: Color variant of MG-006; K plate runner with leg armor parts replaced by P plate runner with Giant Bazooka and Shield parts. Includes 1/20 and 1/100 scale Mash figures.

title: MS-09 Dom
notes: Includes 1/20 and 1/100 scale Ortega figures. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-15.

title: Gundam RX-78 NT-1
series: Mobile Suit Gundam 0080: War in the Pocket
notes: Includes Christina Mackenzie figurine and detachable Chobham Armor. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-53.

title: MS-09R Rick-Dom
notes: Parts variant of MG-021; G and L plate runners replaced by N and O plate runners. Includes Zeon pilot figurine. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-15.

title: RGM-79N GM Custom
notes: Uses the B plate runner of MG-022. Includes 90mm Machine Gun as seen in episode 3 of the OVA, and 1/20 and 1/100 scale South Burning figures. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-24.

title: RGM-79Q GM Quel
notes: Parts and color variant of MG-024. Includes Beam Rifle, 1/20 scale Nina Purpleton figure and 1/100 scale Titans pilot figurine.

title: MSZ-010 ΖΖ Gundam
notes: Includes transformable FXA-07GB Neo Core Fighter, semi-transformable Core Block, and Judau Ashta figurine. Fully transformable kit.

title: Gundam RX-79[G]
series: Mobile Suit Gundam: The 08th MS Team
notes: Includes Weapon Rack and Shiroh Amada figurine. First Gundam kit with arm inner frame parts. Uses Manipulator 1 (MP1) plate runner, a universal runner for the hands of MG ground type EFSF mobile suits.

title: Gundam RX-78-2 Ver.1.5
notes: Parts variant of MG-001. Features pre-assembled legs and waist inner frame. Includes Beam Javelin and Gundam Hammer. Only MG kit to be designated as "Ver.1.5". Released as part of the Gundam 20th Anniversary Big Bang Project.

title: MSN-04 Sazabi
notes: Includes Char Aznable figurine. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-23.

title: FA-010S Full Armor ZZ Gundam
notes: Parts variant of MG-026. Removal of Full Armor parts reveals MSZ-010S Enhanced ZZ Gundam.

title: MS-05B Zaku I (Ramba Ral Custom)
notes: Parts and color variant of MG-018. Includes 1/20 and 1/100 scale Ramba Ral figures.

title: MS-07B Gouf
notes: Includes 1/20 scale Crowley Hamon figure and 1/100 scale Ramba Ral figurine. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-10.

title: Gundam Ez8
series: Mobile Suit Gundam: The 08th MS Team
notes: Parts and color variant of MG-027. Includes 1/20 and 1/100 scale Shiro Amada figures. Uses Manipulator 1 (MP1) plate runner.

title: RX-93 ν Gundam
notes: Features diecast metal parts for the ankles and hips. Includes Amuro Ray figurine. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-23. First Gundam kit with torso inner frame parts.

title: MS-18E Kämpfer
series: Mobile Suit Gundam 0080: War in the Pocket
notes: Includes Mikhail Kaminsky figurine. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-54. Uses Manipulator 2 (MP2) plate runner, a universal hand runner for MG ground-type Principality of Zeon kits.

title: MS-07B-3 Gouf Custom
series: Mobile Suit Gundam: The 08th MS Team
notes: Includes 1/20 and 1/100 scale Norris Packard figures.

title: MSN-00100 Hyaku-Shiki
notes: Includes Quattro Bajeena figurine. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-8. First regular released chrome plated MG kit.

title: Gundam GP03S
notes: Includes Kou Uraki figurine and transformable FF-XII-Sp Core Fighter II-Sp, which can be swapped with the Linear Seat type block. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-24.

title: RGZ-91 Re-GZ
notes: Includes Amuro Ray figurine and display stand for Wave Rider mode or Back Weapon System. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-23.

title: RGM-79[G] GM
series: Mobile Suit Gundam: The 08th MS Team
notes: Parts and color variant of MG-027. Uses Manipulator 1 (MP1) plate runner.

title: AMX-004 Qubeley
notes: Includes Haman Karn figurine.

title: FA-010-A FAZZ
notes: Parts and color variant of MG-030. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-21.

title: MSZ-006A1 Zeta plus
notes: Includes Karaba pilot figurine. Fully transformable kit. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-21.

title: GF13-017NJII G Gundam
notes: Uses "Action Frame" to increase articulation and posing. Includes two clear orange "God Finger" hands, transformable Core Lander and 1/20 and 1/100 scale Domon Kasshu figures. First MG kit from the Future Century timeline.

title: RX-77-2 Guncannon
notes: Includes Spray Missiles, transformable FF-X7 Core Fighter and Kai Shiden figurine. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-12.

title: MSZ-006C1 Ζeta plus C1
notes: Parts and color variant of MG-043. Includes Earth Federation pilot figurine. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-21. Fully transformable kit.

title: GF13-001NHII Master Gundam
notes: Uses "Action Frame" to increase articulation and posing. Includes metal wires for "Distant Crusher" poses, four clear red "Darkness Finger" hands (one for MG-044 to replicate a battle scene from the series), and 1/20 and 1/100 scale Master Asia figures.

title: MS-06F-2 Zaku II F2 (Zeon)
notes: Includes Missile Pods, MMP-80 Machine Gun, and Zeon pilot figurine. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-24.

title: GF13-017NJ Shining Gundam
notes: Uses "Action Frame" to increase articulation and posing. Includes two clear green "Shining Finger" hands, transformable Core Lander, and 1/20 and 1/100 scale Domon Kasshu (in Mobile Trace System suit) figures.

title: RGM-79C GM Type C (Earth Type)
notes: Features modular gun that can be converted into 90mm Machine Gun or GM Rifle. Includes Beam Spray Gun, detachable cockpit block, and Earth Federation pilot figurine. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-24.

title: MSN-02 Zeong
notes: Includes display stands (for unit and arms) and Char Aznable figurine.

title: Gundam RX-78/C.A.
notes: Color variant of MG-028. Includes Char Aznable figurine.

title: GF13-021NG Gundam Spiegel
notes: Uses "Action Frame" to increase articulation and posing. Features collapsible chest to allow crossed arm poses. Includes transformable Core Lander and 1/20 scale Schwarz Bruder and Rain Mikamura (with two different head sculpts) figures.

title: MS-06F-2 Zaku II F2 (E.F.S.F)
notes: Color variant of MG-048 with new head armor; Missile Pods and MMP-80 Machine Gun replaced by MMP-78 Machine Gun and Heat Hawk. Includes Earth Federation pilot figurine. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-24.

title: MSA-0011 S-Gundam
notes: Fully transformable kit. Includes Core Fighter and G-Core. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-21.

title: RGM-79C GM Type C (Space Type)
notes: Color variant of MG-050. Includes additional parts to build Long Rifle. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-24.

title: RX-78-2 Gundam Ver.Ka
notes: Parts and color variant of MG-050. Includes a non-transformable Core Block and MG-050's cockpit block. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-2. First release of a MS redesigned by Hajime Katoki. First Gundam kit to have a fully transformable FF-X7 Core Fighter with a collapsible tail fin.

title: MS-09RS Rick-Dom (Char Custom)
notes: Color variant of MG-021. Includes Char Aznable figurine.

title: MS-14A Gelgoog (Anavel Gato Custom)
notes: Color variant of MG-008. Includes Prototype Beam Rifle, and 1/20 and 1/100 scale Anavel Gato figures. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-24.

title: MSA-0011[Ext] Ex-S Gundam
notes: Parts variant of MG-055. Includes display base for Gundam and Core Fighter. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-21. Transforms via complex parts-forming.

title: MSM-07 Z'Gok
notes: Features option to use three-claw or four-claw hands. Includes Zeon pilot figurine.

title: MSM-03 Gogg
notes: Features foldable arms for cruising mode. Includes Zeon pilot figurine.

title: RX-78-4 Gundam G04
series: Mobile Suit Gundam Side Story: Space, To the End of a Flash
notes: Features no inner frame. Includes booster equipment, Mega Beam Launcher, and Ruce Cassel figurine.

title: RX-78-5 Gundam G05
series: Mobile Suit Gundam Side Story: Space, To the End of a Flash
notes: Parts and color variant of MG-063. Includes booster equipment, Gatling Gun, and Forud Romfellow figurine.

title: GAT-X105 Aile Strike Gundam
notes: Includes Kira Yamato figurine and display base to replicate the Archangel launch pad. First MG kit from the Cosmic Era timeline.

title: MSM-07S Z'Gok (Char Aznable Custom)
notes: Color variant of MG-061. Includes Char Aznable figurine.

title: PF-78-1 Perfect Gundam
notes: Removal of parts reveals an anime-accurate RX-78-2 Gundam. Includes 1/20 and 1/100 scale Shiro Kyoda figures. Instruction manual features a Plamo-Kyoshiro manga.

title: AMX-004-3 Qubeley Mk-II
notes: Color variant of MG-041. Includes 1/20 and 1/100 scale Ple Two figures and custom decals designed by Pepper Shop.

title: XXXG-01W Wing Gundam "Ver.Ka"
notes: Fully transformable kit. Includes Heero Yuy figurine. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-13. First MG kit from the After Colony timeline.

title: RMS-099 Rick Dias
notes: Includes A.E.U.G. pilot figurine. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-11.

title: MSN-02 Perfect Zeong
notes: Parts variant of MG-051.

title: ZGMF-X10A Freedom Gundam
notes: Includes display base and Kira Yamato figurine. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-3.

title: RMS-106 Hi-Zack
notes: Includes Beam Rifle, Heat Hawk, Beam Saber, Missile Pod, and Jerid Messa figurine. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-6.

title: MBF-02 Strike Rouge
notes: Color variant of MG-065. Includes 1/20 and 1/100 scale Cagalli Yula Athha figures.

title: XXXG-00W0 Wing Gundam Zero
series: New Mobile Report Gundam Wing: Endless Waltz
notes: Parts and color variant of MG-069. Includes adjustable display base.

title: RB-79 Mobile Pod Ball "Ver.Ka"
notes: Includes two hangar personnel figurines.

title: RMS-099 Rick Dias (Quattro Vageena Custom)
notes: Color variant of MG-070. Features parts to make different configurations for the rear skirt, backpack binders, and legs. Includes Quattro Bajeena figurine. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-11. K runner is not bagged.

title: RX-78-2 Gundam Ver.One Year War 0079
series: Mobile Suit Gundam: The One Year War
notes: Uses the I and J plate runners of MG-028. Includes Gundam Hammer and Amuro Ray figurine. Does not come with a Core Fighter unlike other MG RX-78-2 kits. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-4. First kit to include articulated hands with pegs and 3-finger parts that can be separated for additional articulation. Released to coincide with the release of PlayStation 2 game Mobile Suit Gundam: The One Year War and the 25th anniversary of Gunpla.

title: RB-79K Ball
series: Mobile Suit Gundam: The 08th MS Team
notes: Parts and color variant of MG-076. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-9.

title: MSM-04 Acguy
notes: Includes effect parts for torpedoes and foot propellers, stub piece to replicate missing right arm in 08th MS Team, display base, and figurines of Akahana, Kikka, Katz, Letz and a Zeon diver. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-14.

title: MSN-00100 Hyaku-Shiki + Ballute Pack
notes: Non-chrome plated variant of MG-037 with Ballute System.

title: RX-178 Gundam Mk-II (A.E.U.G.) Ver.2.0
notes: Redesign of MG-014 with improved articulation and proportions. Includes custom launchpad, and figurines of Kamille Bidan and two hangar personnel. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-19. First MG Ver.2.0. Released to coincide with the 20th anniversary of Mobile Suit Zeta Gundam and the release of the theatrical compilation trilogy A New Translation.

title: MSZ-006 Zeta Gundam Ver.2.0
notes: Redesign of MG-005 with improved articulation and proportions. Fully transformable kit. Includes Hyper Mega Launcher, Grenade Launcher packs, Fa Yuiry and hangar personnel figurines, and custom launchpad that links with MG-082's launchpad. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-20.

title: MSA-003 Nemo
notes: Includes A.E.U.G. pilot figurine.

title: RX-178 Gundam Mk-II (Titans) Ver.2.0
notes: Color variant of MG-082; redesign of MG-015 with improved articulation and proportions. Includes Titans pilot figurine. Launchpad display and hangar personnel figurines not included.

title: YMS-15 Gyan
notes: Features LED light-up Beam Sword. Includes effect parts for Needle Missiles, and one 1/20 and two 1/100 scale M'Quve figurines. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-26.

title: F91 Gundam F91
notes: Includes Seabook Arno figurine, and XMA-01 Rafflesia display base with Iron Mask figurine. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-25. First MG kit to not include any polycaps.

title: RB-79 Ball (Shark Mouth)
notes: Color variant of MG-076.

title: XM-X1 Crossbone Gundam X1 "Ver.Ka"
notes: Uses the F and G plate runners of MG-087. Includes transformable Core Fighter, Scissor Anchor, Anti Beam Coating Cloak, Tobia Arronax figurine, an extra "Skull Heart" chest piece, and extra back skirt parts to create XM-X1 Crossbone Gundam X1 Kai or X1 Kai Kai. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-33.

title: GAT-X105 Strike Gundam + I.W.S.P.
series: Mobile Suit Gundam SEED Frame Astrays
notes: Parts and color variant of MG-065. Includes display base and Sven Cal Bayang figurine.

title: F91 Gundam F91 (Harrison Madin Custom)
notes: Color variant of MG-087 with new right forearm armor; without Rafflesia display stand. Includes Harrison Madin figurine.

title: RGM-79[G] GM Sniper
series: Mobile Suit Gundam: The 08th MS Team
notes: Parts and color variant of MG-040. Includes camouflage net and Earth Federation pilot figurine.

title: ZGMF-X20A Strike Freedom Gundam
notes: Includes display base, and Kira Yamato and Lacus Clyne figurines. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-31.

title: XM-X1 Crossbone Gundam X-1 Full Cloth
notes: Parts variant of MG-089.

title: RX-93-ν2 Hi-ν Gundam
series: Mobile Suit Gundam: Char's Counterattack - Beltorchika's Children
notes: Includes Amuro Ray figurine, a custom display base in the form of his personal insignia, and effect parts for the Fin Funnels. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-32.

title: GAT-X105E Strike Noir Gundam
series: Mobile Suit Gundam SEED C.E. 73: STARGAZER
notes: Uses the D and F plate runners of MG-065. Includes Sven Cal Bayang figurine. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-34.

title: MS-06J Zaku II Ver.2.0
notes: Redesign of MG-003 with improved articulation and proportions. Features a gear mechanism that moves the monoeye when the head is turned sideways and a swivel mechanism that moves the cockpit left or right. Utilizes an assembly system for the cables where the individual rings slide through a rod or spring. Includes Missile Pods and Zeon pilot figurine. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-40/59.

title: MS-06S Zaku II (Char Aznable Custom) Ver.2.0
notes: Parts and color variant of MG-097; redesign of MG-002 with improved articulation and proportions. Missile Pods replaced by Lift unit. Includes Char Aznable figurine. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-41.

title: MS-14S Gelgoog (Char Aznable Custom) Ver.2.0
notes: Redesign of MG-008 with improved articulation and proportions. Includes a 1/100 scale electric car, and figurines of Char Aznable and Lalah Sun to replicate a scene from episode 37. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-41.

title: WD-M01 ∀ Gundam
notes: Includes Rolan Cehack figurine, transformable Core Fighter, and a cow figurine to replicate scenes from the anime. "Moonlight Butterfly" effect parts are sold separately with P-Bandai exclusive accessory kit. First MG kit from the Correct Century timeline. Selected by poll to be the 100th MG released. First MG kit to have stencilled letters on the runners rather than embossed to aid identification.

title: ZGMF-X42S Destiny Gundam
notes: Includes display base and Shinn Asuka and Stella Loussier figurines. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-43.

title: RX-0 Unicorn Gundam "Ver.Ka"
notes: Includes Banagher Links figurine. Beam Gatling Gun and Armed Armor DE were sold separately. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-44. Discontinued following the release of MG-131, but reissued in March 2018 alongside the release of MG-201.

title: MS-06R-1A Zaku II (Black Tri-Stars) Ver.2.0
notes: Parts and color variant of MG-097; redesign of MG-020 with improved articulation and proportions. Includes Black Tri-Stars figurine. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-45.

title: GAT-X105E Lukas's Strike E + I.W.S.P.
series: Mobile Suit Gundam SEED Frame Astrays
notes: Parts and color variant of MG-096 with the Noir Striker replaced by the IWSP unit from MG-090. Includes display base and Lukas O'Donnell figurine.

title: MS-06F Zaku Minelayer
notes: Parts and color variant of MG-097. Includes Minelayer Backpack. Missile Pods replaced by Mine Pods.

title: MS-06F Zaku II Ver.2.0
notes: Parts variant of MG-097. Includes parts to convert Zaku Bazooka into Giant Bazooka, and a colony hatch dial piece for Action Base 1 to replicate scene from episode 1 of the TV series.

title: MS-14A Gelgoog Ver.2.0
notes: Color variant of MG-099. Includes Zeon pilot figurine.

title: GAT-X105 Launcher/Sword Strike Gundam
notes: Parts and color variant of MG-065. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-49.

title: ZGMF-X56S/α Force Impulse Gundam
notes: Includes Silhouette Flyer, figurines of Shinn Asuka and Lunamaria Hawke, connector piece which allows compatibility with MG Striker Packs, and a part of Sword Impulse's Excalibur to replicate a scene from episode 34. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-50. Fully transformable kit.

title: Shin Musha Gundam
notes: Uses frame from MG-028 and the body of MG-078. From the Plamo-Kyoshiro series but with the design based on its appearance on Dynasty Warriors Gundam 2. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-51. China/Hong Kong release includes a set of flower decals.

title: RX-78-2 Gundam Ver.2.0
notes: Includes two Amuro Ray figurines and a clear display stand for FF-X7 Core Fighter. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-52/60. Released to commemorate the 30th anniversary of Gundam, this kit is designed to closely resemble the anime line art.

title: MS-06K Zakucannon
notes: Parts and color variant of MG-097. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-58.

title: MS-06R-2 Zaku II (Johnny Ridden Custom) Ver.2.0
notes: Parts and color variant of MG-103; redesign of MG-007 with improved articulation and proportions. Includes Johnny Ridden figurine. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-56.

title: ZGMF-X19A ∞ Justice Gundam
notes: Includes Athrun Zala figurine. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-5.

title: MS-06R-1A Zaku II (Shin Matsunaga Custom) Ver.2.0
notes: Color variant of MG-103; redesign of MG-006 with improved articulation and proportions. Includes Shin Matsunaga figurine. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-56.

title: MSN-06S Sinanju "Ver.Ka"
notes: Includes Full Frontal figurine and water slide decal sheet. Rocket Bazooka was sold separately; water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-57.

title: G Fighter
notes: Accessory kit for MG-111. Includes figurines of Sayla Mass, Sleggar Law, and two hangar crew members. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-62.

title: RGM-79 GM Ver.2.0
notes: Parts and color variant of MG-111; redesign of MG-017 with improved articulation and proportions. Features the option to use two-piece or three-piece front skirt armor. Includes removable cockpit block and Earth Federation pilot figurine. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-61. Like MG-111, this kit is designed to closely resemble the anime line art and shares the same inner frame and weapon parts.

title: ZGMF-X56S/β Sword Impulse Gundam
notes: Color variant of MG-109. Includes two non-articulated hands to hold the Excaliburs. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-67.

title: MS-07B Gouf Ver.2.0
notes: Uses the G and H plate runners of MG-097; redesign of MG-032 with improved articulation and proportions. Includes Ramba Ral and Crowley Hamon figurines. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-68.

title: G-Armor Realtype Color
notes: Color variant of MG-111 and MG-117. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-70.

title: MS-06J Zaku II "White Ogre"
series: Mobile Suit Gundam MS IGLOO 2: The Gravity Front
notes: Color variant of MG-097. Includes Zaku Bazooka ammo packs.

title: GN-001 Gundam Exia
notes: Includes Setsuna F. Seiei and Karel figurines, and a display base for the GN Drive. GN Drive accommodates Gunpla LED Unit (sold separately). Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-69. First MG kit from the Anno Domini timeline.

title: RX-75-4 Guntank
notes: Includes one Gunpla LED Unit Green, transformable FF-X7 Core Fighter, and figurines of Hayato Kobayashi, Ryu Jose, Bright Noa and Mirai Yashima. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-73.

title: MBF-P03R Gundam Astray Blue Frame Second Revise
series: Mobile Suit Gundam SEED VS Astray
notes: Includes Gai Murakumo figurine and blue Action Base 2 with adapter for the Tactical Arms II. Initial releases included an extra runner with adapter parts to fit Striker Packs from the 1/100 Gundam SEED Model Series. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-74.

title: AMX-004-2 Qubeley Mk-II (Elpeo Ple Custom)
notes: Color variant of MG-041. Includes 1/20 and 1/100 scale Elpeo Ple figures and custom decals designed by Pepper Shop.

title: LM312V04/06 Victory Gundam "Ver.Ka"
notes: Includes Üso Ewin figurine and a Core Fighter to create LM312V06 Victory Gundam Hexa. Also includes an extra PE-molded V-fin as a callback to most HGVG kits. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-75. Fully transformable kit. First MG kit to use swappable fingers for hands with an articulated thumb, which would become the standard for MG kits that do not use Emotion Manipulator SP plate runner.

title: RX-78-3 Gundam Ver.2.0
notes: Color variant of MG-111; redesign of MG-004 with improved articulation and proportions.

title: GNX-603T GN-X
notes: Uses the F and H plate runners of MG-123. Includes Soma Peries and Sergei Smirnov figurines and a display base for the GN Drive Tau unit. GN Drive Tau accommodates Gunpla LED Unit (sold separately). Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-80.

title: MBF-P02Kai Gundam Astray Red Frame
series: Mobile Suit Gundam SEED VS Astray
notes: Parts and color variant of MG-125. Includes Lowe Guele figurine and red Action Base 2 with adapter for the Tactical Arms IIL.

title: RX-0 Unicorn Gundam (OVA Ver.)
notes: Parts and color variant of MG-102 with R1 and R2 plate runners for improved knee and waist articulation, plus a new head sculpt. Includes Banagher Links figurine.

title: XXXG-01W Wing Gundam
notes: Includes Heero Yuy (in episode 1 school uniform) figurine. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-81. Released to commemorate the 15th anniversary of Gundam Wing. Fully transformable kit.

title: Musha Gundam Mk-II
notes: Parts and color variant of MG-082. Features gold plated parts. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-82. China/Hong Kong release includes a set of flower decals.

title: FA-78-1 Full Armor Gundam
notes: Color variant of MG-111 with additional armor parts, which attach to the kit using double-sided tapes. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-83.

title: LM312V04(B-part)+SD-VB03A Core Booster "Ver.Ka"
notes: Accessory kit for MG-127. Contains two Core Fighters: one for Victory Gundam and one for Victory Gundam Hexa. Includes additional weapons and black BA-1 display base.

title: LM312V04+SD-VB03A V-Dash Gundam "Ver.Ka"
notes: Re-release of MG-127 with parts from MG-135.

title: PMX-003 The-O
notes: Includes Paptimus Scirocco figurine. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-90. Released to commemorate the 25th anniversary of Zeta Gundam.

title: XXXG-01D Gundam Deathscythe EW
series: New Mobile Report Gundam Wing Endless Waltz: The Glory of Losers
notes: Includes Duo Maxwell figurine. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-88.

title: RGZ-95 ReZEL
notes: Includes two Riddhe Marcenas figurines and Action Base 1 adapter for Wave Rider mode. Fully transformable kit.

title: GNT-0000 00 Qan[T]
series: Mobile Suit Gundam 00 The Movie -A wakening of the Trailblazer-
notes: Includes Setsuna F. Seiei figurine and black Action Base 2 for GN Sword V in Buster Rifle mode. Chest accommodates Gunpla LED Unit (sold separately). Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-89.

title: RGZ-95C ReZEL Commander Type
notes: Parts and color variant of MG-139. Includes Norm Basilicock figurine. Fully transformable kit.

title: XXXG-01D2 Gundam Deathscythe Hell
series: New Mobile Report Gundam Wing: Endless Waltz
notes: Parts and color variant of MG-138.

title: XXXG-01S Shenlong Gundam EW
series: New Mobile Report Gundam Wing Endless Waltz: The Glory of Losers
notes: Uses the XA and XB plate runners of MG-138. Includes Chang Wufei figurine. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-92.

title: XXXG-01W Wing Gundam EW
series: New Mobile Report Gundam Wing Endless Waltz: The Glory of Losers
notes: Color variant of MG-069. Includes a custom mount part for Action Base 1. Fully transformable kit.

title: GN-0000+GNR-010 00 Raiser
notes: Includes Setsuna F. Seiei (civilian outfit) and Saji Crossroad figurines, and GN Condensers to create GN-0000RE+GNR-010 00 Raiser GN Condenser Type. Chest, GN Drives, and O Raiser binders accommodate Gunpla LED Units (sold separately).

title: OZ-13MS Gundam Epyon EW
series: New Mobile Report Gundam Wing Endless Waltz: The Glory of Losers
notes: Includes Milliardo Peacecraft figurine. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-98. First official Katoki redesign of the Gundam Epyon. Fully transformable kit.

title: MSN-001A1 Delta Plus
notes: Includes Riddhe Marcenas and Audrey Burne figurines, and additional parts to support the frame in Wave Rider mode. Fully transformable kit.

title: GN-0000GNHW/7SG 00 Gundam Seven Sword/G
notes: Parts variant of MG-145. Includes Setsuna F. Seiei (civilian outfit) figurine and original parts to combine the two GN Katars into arm-mounted or handheld twin edge weapon. Chest, GN Drives, and GN Buster Sword II accommodate Gunpla LED Units (sold separately).

title: XXXG-01SR Gundam Sandrock EW
series: New Mobile Report Gundam Wing Endless Waltz: The Glory of Losers
notes: Uses the XA and XB plate runners of MG-138. Includes Quatre Raberba Winner figurine, Heat Shotel and Beam Machine Gun. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-99.

title: RX-0 Full Armor Unicorn Gundam "Ver.Ka"
notes: Parts variant of MG-102 with green psychoframe and Y plate runner for improved knee articulation and leg hardpoints for Grenade racks. Includes Banagher Links figurine, two MG-exclusive Hyper Beam Javelin, and parts to create Type 94 Base Jabber (includes two Earth Federation pilot figurines) for normal Unicorn Gundam. Armed Armor DE was sold separately.

title: XXXG-01H Gundam Heavyarms EW
series: New Mobile Report Gundam Wing Endless Waltz: The Glory of Losers
notes: Uses the XA and XB plate runners of MG-138. Includes Trowa Barton figurine, optional shield piece for Gatling Gun and hidden Beam Saber. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-100.

title: GAT-X102 Duel Gundam Assault Shroud
notes: Includes Yzak Jule figurine and Bazooka that was not seen in the TV series. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately with MG ZGMF-X13A Providence Gundam G.U.N.D.A.M. Edition. Released in conjunction with Gundam SEED Remaster project.

title: Gundam AGE-1 Normal
notes: Features a specialized Inner Frame system. Includes Flit Asuno figurine. First MG kit from the Advanced Generation timeline.

title: Gundam AGE-1 Titus
notes: Parts variant of MG-153.

title: RX-0 Unicorn Gundam 02 Banshee
notes: Parts and color variant of MG-102 with yellow psychoframe; F plate runners are renewed for improved knee articulation. Includes articulated Armed Armor VN/BS and Marida Cruz figurine, as well as a leftover Banagher Links figurine from MG-102. Released to coincide with release of the 5th episode of the OVA.

title: Gundam AGE-1 Spallow
notes: Parts variant of MG-153.

title: RMS-108 Marasai
notes: Includes Titans pilot figurine, "round forming joint" custom attachment for Action Base 1, and adapter parts for the optional Ballute System. Upper torso accommodates Gunpla LED Unit (sold separately).

title: GAT-X207 Blitz Gundam
notes: Uses the B, C, D, E, and F plate runners of MG-152. Includes two Nicol Amalfi figurines. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately with MG ZGMF-X13A Providence Gundam G.U.N.D.A.M. Edition.

title: Gundam AGE-2 Normal
notes: Includes Asemu Asuno figurine. Fully transformable kit.

title: GAT-X103 Buster Gundam
notes: Uses the B, C, D, E, and F plate runners of MG-152. Includes Dearka Elsman figurine. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately with MG ZGMF-X13A Providence Gundam G.U.N.D.A.M. Edition.

title: GAT-X303 Aegis Gundam
notes: Includes Athrun Zala figurine. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately with MG ZGMF-X13A Providence Gundam G.U.N.D.A.M. Edition. Fully transformable kit.

title: Gundam AGE-2 Dark Hound
notes: Parts and color variant of MG-159. Includes Captain Ash figurine. Fully transformable kit.

title: RX-93 ν Gundam "Ver.Ka"
notes: Redesign of MG-034 with improved articulation and proportions. Uses Emotion Manipulator SP (MP1) plate runner, a new preassembled hand design dual-molded in ABS and polypropylene for high articulation. Features "Invoke Mode" gimmick, which consists mainly of a green psychoframe (transformation requires removal of some armor parts). Includes Amuro Ray (blue uniform) figurine, an Amuro insignia display base from MG-095, effect parts for the Fin Funnels, and water slide decal sheet. Neck accommodates Gunpla LED Unit (sold separately). Released to coincide with the 25th anniversary of Char's Counterattack.

title: OZ-00MS Tallgeese EW
series: New Mobile Report Gundam Wing Endless Waltz: The Glory of Losers
notes: Features the spring-loading gimmick on the Dober Gun. Includes Zechs Merquise (TV version) figurine.

title: MSN-06S Sinanju Stein "Ver.Ka"
notes: Parts and color variant of MG-116. Uses Emotion Manipulator SP (MP1) plate runner. Includes Rocket Bazooka and water slide decal sheet.

title: RGZ-95C ReZEL Type C [Defenser B-Unit] [GR]
notes: Parts and color variant of MG-139. Includes Earth Federation pilot figurine and extra backpack to create RGZ-95C ReZEL Type C [Defenser A-Unit] [GR]. Fully transformable kit.

title: MSN-06S Sinanju (OVA Ver.)
notes: Color variant of MG-116, with inner frame materials changed from ABS to polystyrene, hence reducing the risk of peg breakage that modelers experienced with the original kit. Includes Rocket Bazooka of MG-165 with a different handle, and water slide decal sheet. First MG kit to use entirely polystyrene.

title: RGM-96X Jesta
notes: Uses Emotion Manipulator SP (MP1) plate runner. Includes Londo Bell Tri-Stars pilot figurine. Upper torso accommodates Gunpla LED Unit (sold separately).

title: GAT-X105 Aile Strike Gundam Ver.RM
notes: Redesign of MG-065 with improved articulation and proportions. Includes Kira Yamato and Mu La Flaga figurines, stand from MG-065, MG-090 (Re-color version) and MG-108, and battery pack to create GAT-X105+AQM/E-YM1 Perfect Strike Gundam. Uses the B, C, D, E, and F plate runners of MG-152. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-91 and bundled with MG ZGMF-X13A Providence Gundam G.U.N.D.A.M. Edition.

title: Gundam AGE-2 Double Bullet
notes: Parts variant of MG-159.

title: AMS-119 Geara Doga
notes: Includes Neo Zeon pilot figurine. Neck accommodates Gunpla LED Unit (sold separately). Last kit to use the Ver.1.0 box and instruction manual format.

title: RX-78-2 Gundam Ver.3.0
notes:
Uses the D and K plate runners of MG-111, and Emotion Manipulator SP (MP1) plate runner. Includes Amuro Ray figurine. Upper torso accommodates Gunpla LED Unit (sold separately). Beam Javelin, Gundam Hammer and water slide decal sheet are sold separately with P-Bandai exclusive accessory kit; water slide decal sheet is also sold separately as GD-97.

First MG Ver.3.0 kit, part of the evolution of the MG Line, where greater articulation is achieved using a new armor on inner frame placement design. Like the Real Grade version, this kit is modeled after the 1/1 scale RX-78-2 Gundam statue. Released to commemorate the 35th anniversary of Gundam.

title: MBF-02+EW454F Strike Rouge + Ootori Ver.RM
notes: Color variant of MG-169; redesign of MG-074 with improved articulation and proportions. Includes Cagalli Yula Athha figurine, and Ootori first seen in the opening of Phase 14 of SEED Destiny Remastered. Compatible with the Aile Striker from MG-169, the I.W.S.P. from MG-090 and MG-104, and both Sword and Launcher Striker from MG-108.

title: XXXG-00W0 Wing Gundam Proto Zero EW
series: New Mobile Report Gundam Wing Endless Waltz: The Glory of Losers
notes: Includes BA-2 display base with adapter for Neo Bird mode and a Heero Yuy figurine. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-93. First official Katoki redesign of the Wing Gundam Zero TV Version. Fully transformable kit.

title: MSN-04 Sazabi "Ver.Ka"
notes: Redesign of MG-029 with improved articulation and proportions. First and currently the only regular release MG kit to use Emotion Manipulator SP (MP2) plate runner, a new hand design using the same dual molding technique as the earlier Emotion Manipulator SP (MP1) plate runner. Features "Invoke Mode", which consists of opening armor hatches. Includes Long Rifle seen in illustrations, Char Aznable figurine, and water slide decal sheet. Neck accommodates Gunpla LED Unit (sold separately). Funnel effect parts are sold separately as P-Bandai exclusive accessory kit.

title: GAT-X105B/FP Build Strike Gundam Full Package
notes: Parts variant of MG-169. Includes Build Booster and multipurpose connector parts for other MG kits, and Sei Iori figurine. Compatible with all MG Striker packs. First MG kit from the Gundam Build Fighters series.

title: GX-9900 Gundam X
notes: Includes Garrod Ran figurine, clear parts and plated stickers for the Microwave Reflectors. First MG kit from the After War era.

title: 侍ノ弐 Sengoku Astray Gundam
notes: Parts variant of MG-130. Includes Oni no Tate and multipurpose connector parts for other MG kits, and Nils Nielsen figurine.

title: RX-0 Unicorn Gundam 03 Phenex
series: Mobile Suit Gundam UC: One of Seventy Two
notes: Parts and color variant of MG-155. Includes water slide decal sheet and a leftover Banagher Links figurine from MG-102. First regular release chrome plated MG kit since MG-037.

title: RX-178B Build Gundam Mk-II
notes: Color variant of MG-082. Launchpad replaced by MG Build Booster Mk-II. Includes Reiji an the original kit's figurines, and multipurpose connector parts for other MG kits.

title: UB-01 Universe Booster
notes: Accessory kit for MG-176. Includes BA-1 display base, extra parts to convert MG-176 into GAT-X105B/ST Star Build Strike Gundam, effect parts, and multipurpose connector parts for other MG kits.

title: CONCEPT-X 6-1-2 Turn X
notes: Includes Gym Ghingham figurine, custom stand for "Bloody Siege" attack, and effect part for "Shining Finger". Uses entirely polystyrene except for the stand, which is ABS.

title: RX-93-ν2 Hi-ν Gundam "Ver.Ka"
series: Mobile Suit Gundam: Char's Counterattack - Beltorchika's Children
notes: Uses the F, I, and R plate runners of MG-163, and Emotion Manipulator SP (MP1) plate runner; redesign of MG-095 with improved articulation and proportions closer to the original lineart. Includes Amuro Ray figurine, an Amuro insignia display base from MG-095, prop stand for backpack, effect parts for the Fin Funnels, and water slide decal sheet. Neck accommodates Gunpla LED Unit (sold separately).

title: MBF-P03D Gundam Astray Blue Frame D
series: Mobile Suit Gundam SEED Destiny Astray B
notes: Parts and color variant of MG-125. Includes display base and Gai Murakumo and Elsa Weiss figurines. Formation Base for DRAGOON units is sold separately with P-Bandai exclusive accessory kit.

title: PPGN-001 Gundam Exia Dark Matter
notes: Parts and color variant of MG-123. Includes Meijin Kawaguchi the 3rd figurine, Dark Matter Booster and multipurpose connector parts for other MG kits. Dark Matter Booster accommodates Gunpla LED Unit (sold separately).

title: GX-9901-DX Gundam Double X
notes: Uses the B and C plate runners of MG-177. Includes Garrod Ran and Tiffa Adill figurines, clear parts and plated stickers for the Microwave Reflectors.

title: MSN-00100 Hyaku-Shiki Ver.2.0
notes: Redesign of MG-037 with improved articulation and proportions. Armor pieces feature metallic gold painted over clear white plastic. Includes two Quattro Bajeena figurines, and parts to attach to Ballute System. Shares weapon parts with RE-04. Mega Bazooka Launcher and water slide decal sheet is sold separately as P-Bandai exclusive accessory kit. Released to coincide with the 30th anniversary of Zeta Gundam.

title: XXXG-01Wfr Gundam Fenice Rinascita
notes: Uses the F, G, and H plate runners of MG-132. Includes Ricardo Fellini figurine and a redesigned BA-13 Action Base 1. Fully transformable kit.

title: PF-78-3A Gundam Amazing Red Warrior
notes: Parts and color variant of MG-111. Includes Meijin Kawaguchi the 3rd figurine. First MG kit from the Gundam Build Fighters Try series.

title: RX-78-02 Gundam The Origin
notes: Uses the I plate runner of MG-111, and Emotion Manipulator SP (MP1) plate runner. Includes Amuro Ray figurine, and effect parts for the shoulder and forearm guns. Upper torso accommodates Gunpla LED Unit (sold separately). First MG kit from the Mobile Suit Gundam: The Origin series.

title: LM314V21 Victory Two Gundam "Ver.Ka"
notes: Includes two Gundam heads, two Core Fighters with clear attachments for Action Base 1, a Shahkti Kareen figurine, and water slide decal sheet. "Wings of Light" effect parts are sold separately with P-Bandai exclusive accessory kit. Fully transformable kit.

title: ZGMF-X10A Freedom Gundam Ver.2.0
notes: Redesign of MG-072 with improved articulation and proportions. Includes BA-2 display base and Kira Yamato figurine. Effect parts and water slide decal sheet are sold separately as P-Bandai exclusive accessory kit; water slide decal sheet is also bundled with MG ZGMF-X13A Providence Gundam G.U.N.D.A.M. Edition. Uses entirely polystyrene.

title: FA-78 Full Armor Gundam [Gundam Thunderbolt] "Ver.Ka"
notes: Features polyethylene joint seals and a functional emergency pod. Includes display base, Io Fleming figurine, and water slide decal sheet. Beam Rifle and Hyper Bazooka are sold separately with P-Bandai exclusive accessory kit. Released to coincide with the Blu-ray release of Mobile Suit Gundam Thunderbolt: December Sky.

title: MS-06R Zaku II High Mobility Type "Psycho Zaku" [Gundam Thunderbolt] "Ver.Ka"
notes: Parts and color variant of MG-103. Features polyethylene joint seals. Includes Base 5 display base, stand for propellant tank, Daryl Lorenz figurine, and water slide decal sheet (metallic silver in initial releases of the kit). First MG kit to have bilingual Japanese/English text on its box packaging and instruction manual.

title: RGM-79SP GM Sniper II
series: Mobile Suit Gundam 0080: War in the Pocket
notes: Uses the H, I, and J plate runners of MG-111 and the MP plate runner of MG-153. Features WP plate runner, which is a universal weapons runner for some MG Earth Federation kits. Includes Earth Federation pilot figurine. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-118.

title: ZGMF-X13A Providence Gundam
notes: Uses the I and J plate runners of MG-192. Uses entirely polystyrene except for the cables, which are TPE. Includes effect parts for DRAGOON units, BA-2 display base, and Rau Le Creuset figurine. Additional effect parts for DRAGOON units and water slide decal sheet are sold separately as P-Bandai exclusive accessory kit.

title: ZGMF-X09A Justice Gundam
notes: Uses the I and J plate runners of MG-192. Includes BA-13 Action Base 1, Action Base 1 adapters for the Gundam and Fatum-00 unit, and Athrun Zala figurine. Uses entirely polystyrene.

title: MSZ-010 ZZ Gundam "Ver.Ka"
notes: Redesign of MG-026 with improved articulation and proportions. Features silver metallic detail parts. Includes two transformable FXA-07GB Neo Core Fighters, Action Base 1 adapter for Core Top, Judau Ashta figurine (Double Beam Rifle features Iino Abbav figurine), and water slide decal sheet. Released to commemorate the 30th anniversary of Gundam ZZ. Fully transformable kit.

title: RGM-79SC GM Sniper Custom
notes: Parts and color variant of MG-118. Includes Earth Federation pilot figurine.

title: RGM-79G GM Command (Colony Type)
series: Mobile Suit Gundam 0080: War in the Pocket
notes: Parts and color variant of MG-195. Color variant of P-Bandai exclusive MG RGM-79GS GM Command Space with a different backpack. Water slide decal sheet is sold separately as GD-118. The 200th MG release. Originally planned to be released in January 2018[2].

title: RX-0 Unicorn Gundam 02 Banshee "Ver.Ka"
notes: Parts and color variant of MG-102; F plate runners are renewed for improved knee articulation. Re-release of P-Bandai exclusive MG RX-0 Unicorn Gundam 02 Banshee "Ver.Ka" (Final Battle Ver.) with yellow psychoframe. Includes water slide decal sheet and a leftover Banagher Links figurine from MG-102, but no Marida Cruz or Riddhe Marcenas figurine.

title: MSA-0011[Bst] Plan303E Deep Striker
notes: Parts and color variant of MG-060. Includes display base. Released to commemorate the 30th anniversary of Gundam Sentinel. Largest and most expensive MG release to date.

title: F91 Gundam F91 Ver.2.0
notes: Redesign of MG-087 with improved articulation and proportions. Features metallic detail parts. Includes two heads (transformable and non-transformable), Cecily Fairchild figurine, and a gray custom base using a black Action Base 4/5 hexagon as platform. Chest vents and backpack thrusters accommodate Gunpla Lighting Unit (sold separately) via the custom base.

title: RGM-89 Jegan
notes: Uses the MP plate runner of MG-153. Uses entirely polystyrene. Unlike majority of the MG kits, no character figurine is included. Released to commemorate the 30th anniversary of Char's Counterattack and as part of Bandai's "UC NexT 0100" project.

title: GNT-0000/FS 00 Qan[T] Full Saber
notes: Re-release of MG-140 with GN Sword IV Full Saber, new antenna and a modified backpack unit, but without Action Base 2. Includes Setsuna F. Seiei figurine and clear Action Base 5 for GN Sword IV Full Saber. Released to coincide with the 10th anniversary of Gundam 00.

title: MSN-06S-2 Sinanju Stein (Narrative Ver.)
notes: Color variant of MG-165 with new "Sleeves" parts. Uses Emotion Manipulator SP (MP1) plate runner. Includes Grenade Launcher, a pair of lengthened External Propellant Tanks and leftover Full Frontal pilot and standing figurines from MG-165, but no Zoltan Akkanen figurine.

title: GN-002 Gundam Dynames
notes: Uses entirely polystyrene, except for the GN Cables, which are EVAC. GN Drive accommodates Gunpla LED Unit (sold separately). Includes Lockon Stratos (with Haro) figurine.

title: AGE-IIMG Gundam AGEII Magnum
notes: Parts and color variant of MG-159, with shoulder joints revised for improved articulation and stability. Includes Kyoya Kujo figruine, as well as a leftover Asemu Asuno figurine from the original kit. Fully transformable kit.

title: MSA-0011[Ext] Ex-S Gundam / MSA-0011 S Gundam
notes: Parts and color variant of MG-055 and MG-060; either of the two units can be built at any time. Uses head, shoulder, chest, and backpack of MG-202 with redesigned abdomen parts and new fixed hands for various poses. Includes clear display base, cables for INCOM units and a marking sheet designed by Hajime Katoki.

title: RX-78NT-1 Gundam NT-1 Ver.2.0
series: Mobile Suit Gundam 0080: War in the Pocket
notes: Redesign of MG-022 with improved articulation and proportions; uses the K plate runner of MG-111. Features polyethylene joint seals. Includes hyper bazooka, broken V-fin as seen in episode 4 of the OVA, optional headgear based on the SD Gundam BB Senshi versions, and Alfred Izuruha, Bernard Wiseman, and Christina Mackenzie (pilot suit) figurines. Released to commemorate the 30th anniversary of Gundam 0080.

title: ZGMF-1000/A1 Gunner ZAKU Warrior (Lunamaria Hawke Custom)
notes: Includes Lunamaria Hawke figurine. Leg hoses are preassembled using ABS-PP dual-molding technique. Uses entirely polystyrene except for the leg and backpack hoses. Released to coincide with the 15th anniversary of Gundam SEED Destiny.

title: ASW-G-08 Gundam Barbatos
notes: Uses entirely polystyrene. Features plated sliver cylinders and gold inner frame parts; clear green parts for eyes and clear pink parts for emblems. Mace features two detachable blades. Includes Smoothbore Gun and Mikazuki Augus figurine. First release from the Post Disaster timeline. Originally planned to be released in November 2019, but was delayed due to unspecified reasons[3].

title: FA-010A FAZZ "Ver.Ka"
notes: Parts and color variant of MG-198; redesign of MG-042 with improved articulation and proportions. Includes water slide decal sheet.

title: GN-003 Gundam Kyrios
notes: Fully transformable kit. GN Drive accommodates Gunpla LED Unit (sold separately). Includes Allelujah Haptism figurine.

notes: Resin-cast conversion kit for MG-001/004.

notes: Resin-cast conversion kit for MG-003.
